entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
